testcase.name: Testing Search Feature in PUP Site - Karate Search
testcase.system-out: Given def step1 = 'Using Chrome as a browser' ............................. passed * configure driver = {type:'chromedriver', executable: 'C:/Program Files/Google/Chrome/Application/chromedriver.exe'} . passed And def step2 = 'Browser Navigates to PUP search website' ................. passed * driver 'https://www.pup.edu.ph/' ........................................ passed And def step3 = 'Maximize Browser' ........................................ passed * driver.maximize() ....................................................... passed And def step4 = 'wait til complete' ....................................... passed * waitUntil("document.readyState == 'complete'") .......................... passed * click('.services-widget') ............................................... passed And def step5 = 'User click Applicant Button' ............................. passed * click('{^a}Applicant') .................................................. passed * driver.screenshot() ..................................................... passed And def step6 = 'User input text search' .................................. passed * input('#txtSearch', 'BSIT') ............................................. passed When def step7 = 'User click search button' ............................... passed * click('#btnSearch') ..................................................... passed Then def step8 = 'User expected results should be displayed in the website' . passed * waitFor('.table') ....................................................... passed * screenshot() ............................................................ passed
